sys_hub_flow.name: NeedIt Fulfillment

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Get approval from Requested for's Manager
Create Human Resources request NeedIt Task
Create High Priority Legal request NeedIt Task
Update NeedIt State to Closed Complete

sys_hub_trigger_instance.comment: Set State to Awaiting Approval and assign to Beth Anglin
